headline.main: RUMANIANS FLEEING CRIMEA AND ODESSA; Mass Exodus From Bessarabia Also Reported in Turkey

lead_paragraph: ISTANBUL, Dec. 1 (AP) -- Details of a mass exodus of Rumanians fleeing the Crimea, Odessa and Bessarabia in the face of the Red Army's onslaught in southern Russia have been brought here by travelers from Rumania.
abstract: mass Rumanian pub exodus from Bessarabia in face of USSR invasion threat reptd
